Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.doc: Keyword responsável por aguardar o elemento estar visível e clicar.

kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: E seleciono a tarifa de ida e volta

kw.doc: Keyword responsável por aguardar o elemento estar visível e clicar.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.
kw.msg: Element '(//div[@aria-label='Ver tarifas deste voo. Selecionar'])[1]' not visible after 20 seconds.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Run Keyword And Return Status
kw.doc: Runs the given keyword with given arguments and returns the status as a Boolean value.

kw.name: Press Keys
kw.doc: Simulates the user pressing key(s) to an element or on the active browser.

kw.doc: Keyword responsável por aguardar o elemento estar visível e clicar.

kw.name: Quando clicar em prosseguir para pagamento
Então o sistema devera prosseguir para a tela de viajantes
